name: Book of Mormon Adventure Deluxe
description:
Inspired by your favorite hidden object games. Explore and learn about the Book of Mormon while you find hidden keys to the game.

**40% off for today only.**

The game is fast paced, and fun to learn. Every screen reinforces stories and principles from the Book of Mormon.

The app features 13 chapters and 26 games. The chapters include stories like Moroni and Mormon, The Strippling Warriors, and King Benjamin. The chapters include principles like Family Home Evening, Missionary Work, and Reading Scriptures.

It makes a great activity for Family Home Evening, the Sabbath day, or during meetings where your children's attention would otherwise wander. While designed to keep younger children engaged, older children, teenagers, and even adults find they can't put it down!

FEATURES

► Original artwork created exclusively for this app
► 13 Chapters
► Dozens of sounds and voice recordings of stories and principles from the Book of Mormon
► Designed for all ages–no confusing menus or navigation
► Unlimited play, with each game flowing right into the next
► Universal app, works great on iOS 8, supports retina display
